title: Try Not To Laugh Challenge #79 - Hard Mode w/ Gus Johnson
author: Smosh Pit
description:
@Gus Johnson, the king of not laughing, could win our hard mode edition of Try Not To Laugh in his sleep— but, can we finally make *him* crack this time? 

Punch that bell icon so you'll know when we add a new episode!

0:00 - In this episode…
0:34 - Intro to Hard Mode
1:42 - Kimmy’s Turn
5:48 - Tommy’s Turn
10:19 - Damien’s Turn
14:09 - Courtney’s Turn
17:47 - Shayne’s Turn
21:16 - Gus’ Turn
27:59 - Outro

This video was shot with a very limited crew. All cast & crew followed all CDC and California COVID-19 precautions and filming guidelines.
